snippet: Interpreters play a vital role in the fight game, letting viewers know what foreign fighters, and their cornermen, are saying.
abstract: Interpreters play a vital role in boxing, letting viewers know what foreign fighters, and their cornermen, are saying; they work at news conferences and in meetings with broadcasters, but are most visible during the one-minute breaks between rounds and in postmatch interviews; despite an interpreter’s best efforts, 100 percent accuracy is not possible, and sometimes a boxer’s rambling answer is considerably condensed.
lead_paragraph: Interpreters play a vital role in the fight game, letting viewers know what foreign fighters, and their cornermen, are saying.

headline.seo: In Boxing, Interpreters Bring Clarity to TV Coverage
headline.main: Interpreters Help to Tell the Story Behind the Fight
headline.print_headline: Interpreters Help to Tell The Story Behind the Fight
